title: Creating a private chat room with Jitsi on Microsoft Azure VM | Azure Tips and Tricks
excerpt: In this video, you'll learn how to create a private video conferencing service with Jitsi on a Microsoft Azure VM.   For more tips and tricks, visit: https://aka.ms/azuretipsandtricks   Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure:
